p: Naturalized and/or weedy Prosopis are reported in 112 countries. Currently 23 countries with weedy or invasive Prosopis (21 %) implement some form of formal management. No countries rely exclusively on biological control, 6 (26 %) use only mechanical or chemical control, 5 (22 %) use control through utilization and 11 (48 %) apply an integrated approach (three or more methods, including biological control, mechanical control, chemical control, control through utilization and cultural control) (TableÂ 2).
